tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    last_inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_compliance_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecord (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id UUID NOT NULL,
    agency_id UUID NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES Facility(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES ComplianceAgency(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Environmental_Compliance_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Regulations (
  regulation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
  inspection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Standards (
  standard_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_compliance_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulation_standards (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  standard_id INT,
  standard_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE,
  company_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES environmental_compliance_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
  company_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES environmental_compliance_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE fines (
  fine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  fine_date DATE,
  company_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES environmental_compliance_data(id)
)
